page.title: 08LIFE IN KILMINGTON CONT'D
page.content: {THE NEW VILLAGE HALL. The newest building is the new village hall, which is under construction. For several years there have been fund-raising events organised in the village and, after much hard work and effort, the building commenced this year. The hall will open in October and be much larger than the old hall. It is being built of bricks, with rosy-coloured windows all around the top. The cost is 87000 pounds. {Opinions }vary; the comments made to us included: too big, waste of money, super, good, the best, too modern, better than the old one, looks good, ugly. (You never can please everyone!) {Inside the new hall}there will be one large hall with a wooden floor, where main activities will be held, and badminton can be played. It also has a lounge,bar,kitchen,stores and toilets.
